Vignan University Online

Andhra Pradesh

NIRF| AICTE | UGC | WES | NAAC A+

4.5 (127 user ratings)
★★★★★ 4.5/5

Study Mode: Distance

Institution Type : Private

About Vignan's Deemed University

Vignan Online has become a great name in the field of online education. The university offers credible and valid courses through online mode as the university is UGC approved. Apart from this, the university has gotten several other approvals like AICTE, ISO, etc. The university has also ranked among the top 100 universities in the NIRF and is also NAAC A+ accredited.

The university offers several undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the field of management and computer applications like BBA, BCA, MBA, and MCA. All the courses offered are through an online mode of education. The university also offers a varied number of electives or specializations from which one can choose. Not only this, the university offers various additional certificate courses powered by Coursera, eDX, SWAYAM, and NPTEL. Students get access to these additional courses as they enroll in a degree program without any additional cost.

These courses are managed and easily conducted by an effective learning management system (LMS). The university conducts live classes and examinations through LMS. Interactive live sessions are conducted for resolving the doubts of the students easily. On LMS the student can easily access all learning materials, take classes, and much more. Along with this, the university offers career and mentorship guidance to the students with the help of industry experts and an industry-oriented curriculum.

The university has a sprawling campus spread over 350 acres and is equipped with modern amenities such as state-of-the-art labs, libraries, sports facilities, and hostel facilities for students. The faculty comprises experienced and learned professionals who provide quality education and mentor students to excel in their careers. Vignan’s Deemed University also has collaborations with international universities for student exchange programs, giving students an opportunity to experience global education standards.

Overall, Vignan’s Deemed University is one of the leading higher education institutions in Andhra Pradesh, providing quality education and shaping future leaders of the country.

Approvals
  • UGC-DEB
  • AICTE
  • NIRF
  • NAAC A+
  • ISO
Vignan University Online Admission Process

The whole admission procedure at the Vignan Online university takes place in online mode. There is no need to visit the campus for the admission process. Fresh admission generally starts in the month of January of every year.

Admissions are on a direct basis no entrance exam is required to take admission to the university. The student only needs to follow the steps given below to take admission to this university.

The admission procedure for the online courses at Vignan Online is as follows:

Step 1: The first step is to visit the admission portal of the university.

Step 2: Then on the admission portal firstly register yourself by entering the necessary information on the portal

Step 3: After registration, the university will send the login credentials to the candidate’s mail for completing the further application process.

Step 4: After logging in, start filling up the application form by entering the details asked.

Step 5: After successfully filling up the application form upload the necessary documents as mentioned in the form in the required size and format

Step 6: At last review, the complete application form for the last time, then move forward with the fee payment process. And finally, submit the application form. Fees can be paid through various online payment modes like Net Banking/Debit Card/Credit Cards, etc

Step 7: After submission, your application is reviewed and verified by the university administration. Post successful verification the admission confirmation mail is sent to the candidate via the contact information given at the time of registration.

List of Documents
    • Marksheets
    • Residential Proof
    • Proof of Date of Birth
    • Government Issued ID
    • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
    • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
    • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
    • Two passport size colored photographs
    • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why Vignan's Deemed University

The university offers online courses that are UGC approved.

Along with UGC approvals, the university has also gotten various other approvals like NAAC A+, AICTE, NIRF, etc.

Any student whether working or not can easily access the live classes with the help of recorded/per-recorded lectures and live classes.

The live online classes are conducted periodically on weekends.

The university also provides the student with various kinds of EMI options, for easy payment of course fees.

The university provides great student support to the students by easily clarifying student queries through the chat feature.

Discussion forums have been made to increase the interaction among and between fellow students and teachers.

The university provides the best career guidance and mentorship to the student by conducting placement training programs, interview preparation sessions, etc.

The university has partnered with various top companies to provide placement support to the students.

To ensure fair practices in the examination, it is being conducted through online proctored technologies.

The university also guides the student for a further step in their career like enrolling in higher courses or pursuing a job.
